Package eg.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConsoleOpenable
    Interface to open the console panel in MainWin
    LineNrWidthAdaptable
    Interface to revalidate the edit area when the width of the area that shows line numbers has to change
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditArea
    The editor view that defines a JPanel that contains the text area for editing text and the area that displays line numbers
    FontSettingWin
    A diaolog for setting the font and font size
    IconFiles  
    InfoWin
    A frame that shows info about Eadgyth
    MainWin
    The main window
    Toolbar
    The toolbar.
    ToolPanel
    Defines a panel to which a variable Component can be added
    ViewSettingWin
    The frame that contains components to enter preferences for the display of the main window
